WEkEO is one of several portals which provide access to ESA Copernicus and Sentinal satellite data. The wekeoR package simplifies provides a wrapper for the WEkEO Harmonised Data Access (HDA) API. 

More information on WEkEO can be found here. Documentation and more information on the API itself can be found here.
